page.title: 11A Uyeasound Grandad.
page.content: My Grandad is a very healthy,lively octogenarian. He is one of the oldest men on Unst. He lives in the Uyeasound Sheltered Housing. He gets up at 8-00 and has a cup of coffee before having a wash and shave. At 9-00 he has breakfast. If it is Monday he washes his clothes and works in his garden. At 11-00 he prepares and cooks dinner for himself, his son and anyone else working on the farm at Clivocast. After lunch he washes the dishes and then spends about an hour at the farm. He returns by 3-00 and rests until 5-00 when he makes and eats tea. He then rests during the evening. He bakes lots of muffins and salts fish whenever the family come home with a good catch. He is well known as an auctioneer at Unst Charity Sales.
